00001 def nsgabest(pop, rand, size):
00002     newpop = pop[:]
00003     if hasattr(pop[0], 'rank'):
00004         newpop.sort(lambda a,b: cmp(a.rank, b.rank))
00005     subset = newpop[:size]
00006     newindex = []
00007     for ind in subset:
00008         newindex.append(pop.index(ind))
00009     return subset, newindex
